machinekit-down.message: Machinekit is not running please restart machinekit and then the server!

content-not-allowed.message: Request can only be Content-Type: application/json

file-exists.message: File with given name already on server

invalid-content.message: Server was unable to decode the send data. Make sure you are sending valid JSON!

whitelist-error.message: This IP address has been blocked or is not allowed to operate the machine

invalid-home-command.message: Unknown command. Command must be either home or unhome

invalid-program-command.message: Unknown command. Command must be one of: start, pause, stop, resume

invalid-spindle-speed-command.message: Unknown command. Command must be either spindle_increase or spindle_decrease

invalid-spindle-brake-command.message: Unknown command. Command must be either brake_engaged or brake_disengaged

invalid-spindle-direction-command.message: Unknown command. Command must be either spindle_reverse or spindle_forward

invalid-spindle-enabled-command.message: Unknown command. Command must be either spindle_on or spindle_off

invalid-status-command.message: Unknown command. Command must be either estop or power

invalid-multiple-commands.message: Not allowed to chain multiple commands
